He said <S%H559><s%> unto me again <S%H5975><s%>, Stand, I pray you <S%H4191><s%>, upon me, and kill me <S%H7661><s%>: for anguish is come <S%H270><s%> upon me <S%H5315><s%>, because my life is yet whole in me.

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H1818><s%>, Your blood be upon your head <S%H7218><s%>; for your mouth <S%H6310><s%> has testified <S%H6030><s%> against you <S%H559><s%>, saying, I have slain <S%H4191><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s anointed <S%H4899><s%>.
And David <S%H1732><s%> lamented <S%H6969><s%> with this lamentation <S%H7015><s%> over Saul <S%H7586><s%> and over Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>:
